pages.title: Kamen Rider Core (Reinforced)
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider: Climax Scramble (2018, Switch game)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ooo/devices/gaia_core_typhoon#powered_up_core_driver)Powered Up Gaia Core Typhoon$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Fire Resistance III$(li)Strength
